SCRIPT.MSCRI:
! printing the command formed : PRINT "EXECUTING CMD : &UC4RB_RUN_CMD#"
: SWITCH &$PLATFORM# : CASE "WINDOWS"
: IF &UC4RB_OSB_WEBLOGIC_HOME# <> '' SET WEBLOGIC_HOME=&UC4RB_OSB_WEBLOGIC_HOME# : ENDIF : IF &UC4RB_OSB_HOME# <> '' SET OSB_HOME=&UC4RB_OSB_HOME# : ENDIF
IF "%WEBLOGIC_HOME%" EQU "" ( echo "ERROR: WEBLOGIC_HOME is not set" SET ERROR=1 ) ELSE ( IF "%OSB_HOME%" EQU "" ( echo ""ERROR: OSB_HOME is not set"" SET ERROR=1 ) ) IF %ERROR% EQU 0 ( call %WEBLOGIC_HOME%\server\bin\setWLSEnv.cmd ) IF %ERRORLEVEL% NEQ 0 SET ERROR=%ERRORLEVEL%
IF %ERROR% EQU 0 ( set CLASSPATH=%OSB_HOME%\lib\sb-kernel-api.jar;%OSB_HOME%\modules\com.bea.common.configfwk_1.7.0.0.jar;%OSB_HOME%\lib\sb-kernel-impl.jar;%OSB_HOME%\lib\alsb.jar;%CLASSPATH% ) IF %ERRORLEVEL% NEQ 0 SET ERROR=%ERRORLEVEL% IF %ERROR% EQU 0 ( &UC4RB_RUN_CMD# ) IF %ERRORLEVEL% NEQ 0 SET ERROR=%ERRORLEVEL%
: CASE "UNIX" : IF &UC4RB_OSB_WEBLOGIC_HOME# <> '' WEBLOGIC_HOME=&UC4RB_OSB_WEBLOGIC_HOME# : ENDIF : IF &UC4RB_OSB_HOME# <> '' OSB_HOME=&UC4RB_OSB_HOME# : ENDIF if [ -z != $WEBLOGIC_HOME ] then . $WEBLOGIC_HOME/server/bin/setWLSEnv.sh if [ "$?" -eq 0 ] then if [ -z != $OSB_HOME ] then export CLASSPATH=$CLASSPATH:$OSB_HOME/lib/sb-kernel-api.jar:$OSB_HOME/modules/com.bea.common.configfwk_1.7.0.0.jar:$OSB_HOME/lib/sb-kernel-impl.jar:$OSB_HOME/lib/alsb.jar if [ "$?" -eq 0 ] then &UC4RB_RUN_CMD# error=$? else echo "ERROR: Unable to set the CLASSPATH" error=1 fi else echo "ERROR: OSB_HOME is not set" error=1 fi fi else echo "ERROR: WEBLOGIC_HOME is not set" error=1
fi : OTHER : ENDSWITCH
